title: Serene Luxury Studio with Mountain Views and Resort-Style Amenities
description:
Step into cozy sophistication in this beautifully appointed studio, thoughtfully designed for modern comfort. Featuring an open-plan bedroom area and a stylish bathroom, its layout makes excellent use of 38 square meters. Sunlit interiors combine seamlessly with upscale touches and a direct walkout to shared recreation zones.

You'll appreciate move-in ready convenience and warm refinement throughout. From premium finishes to energy-efficient design, this low-maintenance home is both elegant and practical for individual or couple living.
neighborhood_description:
Surrounded by the picturesque scenery of Dyrekcja, this tranquil residence offers inspiring views of nearby mountains and immediate proximity to family-friendly parks and playgrounds. The peaceful neighborhood boasts low traffic, making it perfect for those seeking quiet and nature-rich surroundings.

Easy highway connections promise convenient travel to Chelm city center, regional attractions, and the countryside beyond, while spacious green spaces encourage a relaxed and healthy lifestyle.
lifestyle_benefits: access to walking and cycling trails
target_buyer: Perfect for a discerning single professional or couple who wish to enjoy luxury features and peaceful, scenic living while remaining within easy driving reach of city conveniences.
market_positioning: Distinct among countryside studios, this property captures luxury living in a serene natural setting, rare in Chelm's real estate market. Ideal for buyers valuing exclusive amenities and tranquility within a close-knit, outdoor-focused neighborhood.
